mapper.select: select a.announce_proper_num, c.trial_fcltt_description, a.announce_title, a.announce_content, a.announce_start_date, a.announce_end_date, a.announce_first_date, a.announce_last_date from tb_002 a join tb_010 c on a.trial_fcltt_proper_num = c.trial_fcltt_proper_num ORDER BY ANNOUNCE_START_DATE DESC LIMIT 8;
select * from TB_004 ORDER BY FAQ_ASK_DATE DESC;
select * from TB_003 ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC;
